channel.title: NewDivinity 508+ [MOST COMPLETE SERVER YET] [DOWNLOAD INSIDE]
channel.description:
-All skills working -All minigames working -More Shops -Better dungeoneering, -More items, -Random vote for reward -Donation system -Better donator shops(not in video) -Better barrows -Xp lamps -Slayer xp lamps -Hold more players -Better economy(prices was loveed up) -Revenats -Random EP Loots -Working Jad -Tok haar kal Minigame -Better XP Rates
[b]Updates:[/b] -Lottery system -HighScores -Every prayer is working -veng working -New Xp interface! -::yell command -All specs are working -18 Different[Nex, Bork, Skeletal] -Minigames -Barrowns now on the ground -1 secret minigame! -Custom items and more coming -Admin and Mod places open -All Specs are working -All 24 skills are working -Custom dungeoneering -Donator zone -All specs are working -Staff zone -Overloads are working -Great Economy -Great Pking system 100% working -Many shops -Added construction[Public/Private] -Fully working trade system whit price check -100% working Duel Arena -Staking, Dice working -100% Lootshare and coinshare -100% Working clan chat -Random ep loots -Vote working
Places/Shops/Teles [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RiMruxCYa6A[/youtube]
Places/Shops/Teles [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_sR8rNo6PDA[/youtube]
Trading [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sT2gmhwqUo4[/youtube]
Duelling [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8wuUROEAzR4[/youtube]
Pking [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=daEhphvSHmM[/youtube]
Coming Soon: -Own website/webclient (about 80% done ) -Forums -Donate -More Custom items -Revenats whit vesta and statius drops -More BossesMaybe Suggest Some boss -More shops coming
SERVER DOWNLOAD: http://ge.tt/api/1/files/4iwgLKg/0/blob?download
Make sure you're using a 508+ client in order for it to work correctly.

item.title: NewDivinity 508+ [MOST COMPLETE SERVER YET] [DOWNLOAD INSIDE]
item.dc:creator: @adeathsmckitten adeathsmckitten
item.description:
@adeathsmckitten wrote:

[quote=“Flame_, post:5, topic:518907”][quote author=adeathsmckitten link=topic=637174.msg4296033#msg4296033 date=1368235784]

There has already been a thread pertaining to the download for this server.
You can find the original thread here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,637159.0.html

There is currently no download link provided in the post that you have linked. They are both the same server. I am one of 6 who helped create this and have permission to release it to the public.
[/quote]
Regardless, you could have told that user to add a download link. And if what you said about working in a team is true, then you should have contact with that member.[/quote]

They’re away right now. This is literally what they told me to do. Copy the post and add an download link. They will be deleting the old post when they get back.

Read full topic
